***Tweets***

```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)

tweets <- read_csv("~/Desktop/SocialMediaStory_NLP/scores_tweets.csv")

ggplot(data=tweets) + geom_histogram(aes(pos), bins = 50)
ggplot(data=tweets) + geom_histogram(aes(neu), bins = 50)
ggplot(data=tweets) + geom_histogram(aes(neg), bins = 50)
ggplot(data=tweets) + geom_histogram(aes(compound), bins = 50)

# mean(tweets$neg) # mean of neg
# sd(tweets$neg) # sd of neg
# 
# mean(tweets$neu) # mean of neu
# sd(tweets$neu) # sd of neu
# 
# mean(tweets$pos) # mean of pos
# sd(tweets$pos) # sd of pos
# 
# mean(tweets$compound) # mean of compound
# sd(tweets$compound) # sd of compound

sum(tweets$pos > tweets$neg) # number of posts more positive than negative
sum(tweets$pos < tweets$neg) # number of posts more negative than positive
sum(tweets$pos == tweets$neg) # number of posts as negative as positive

plot_twe <- ggplot(data = tweets)

inputPanel(
  selectInput("y", label = "y-variable:",
              choices = c("neg", "neu", "pos", "compound"), selected = "neg"),
  
  selectInput("x", label = "x-variable:",
              choices = c("neg", "neu", "pos", "compound"), selected = "pos")
)

output$myplot <- renderPlot({
    plot_twe + geom_point(aes(x = eval(as.symbol(input$x)), y = eval(as.symbol(input$y))), color = "pink", size = 1.5) + 
      ggtitle(paste("Plot of", input$y, "against", input$x, sep = " ")) +
      xlab(input$x) + ylab(input$y) + coord_cartesian(ylim=c(0,1), xlim = c(0,1)) + geom_abline(slope=1)
})

output$click_info <- renderPrint({
  paste("pos: ", as.character(nearPoints(tweets, input$plot_click, xvar = input$x, yvar = input$y)[, "pos"]),
        " neg: ", as.character(nearPoints(tweets, input$plot_click, xvar = input$x, yvar = input$y)[, "neg"]), 
        " neu: ", as.character(nearPoints(tweets, input$plot_click, xvar = input$x, yvar = input$y)[, "neu"]),
        " comp: ", as.character(nearPoints(tweets, input$plot_click, xvar = input$x, yvar = input$y)[, "compound"]), sep = "")
})
plotOutput("myplot",height=400,width = 600,click="plot_click")
verbatimTextOutput("click_info")
```
